name: lesspass
description: LessPass node module used to generate LessPass passwords
author: Guillaume Vincent <guillaume@oslab.fr>

scripts.build: rimraf dist && npm run build:debug && npm run build:min
scripts.prepublish: npm test && npm run build && npm run test:umd && npm run test:browser
scripts.test:umd: npm run build && cd tests && node node.js && cd ..
scripts.test:browser: npm run build && karma start tests/karma.config.js
